item.title: NextEra And Exxon Mobil Team Up On Massive Gas-Powered AI Energy Push
item.description: The plant would combine Exxon’s carbon capture and sequestration expertise with Energy Resources’ development expertise, the company said.

item.title: Terns Pharmaceuticals Stock Jumps After New Leukemia Drug Data Show Strong Patient Responses
item.description: New Phase 1 data showed strong response rates and a favorable safety profile for its experimental leukemia drug TERN-701.

item.title: Nvidia Could Reopen China Market — US Mulls H200 Export Approval To Avoid Losing Ground To Local Chip Rivals
item.description: The US is reportedly considering allowing Nvidia to export its older H200 GPUs to China as a middle-ground approach to AI chip controls.

item.title: Comcast Admits Warner Bros. Deal Was a Long Shot: 'We Debated Whether To Bother Or Not'
item.description: Comcast said its Warner Bros. bid stayed limited because it refused to overextend financially and saw little chance of being chosen.

item.title: Best Energy Stocks In 2025
item.description: After grappling with weak margins for several quarters, refiners saw their fortunes reverse this year amid tighter fuel supplies.
